children.text: Retype your PIN and press the = button to confirm
We strongly recommend you to set also an alphanumeric password  to increase the security of your archive
The alphanumeric password will be requested after inserting the 4-digits PIN and can be used to reset the PIN.
Please set an hint to help you remember your 4-digits PIN
Be very careful to set a valid hint. If you'll forget your PIN there will be no other ways to recover it.
